properties.description: Unzip file in Azure blob storage "data" containger and copy contents to "out" container

sources.name: HandyCandyParquet
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~>  HandyCandyParquet

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared HandyCandyParquet = let AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://adfblob204.blob.core.windows.net/output/datalake/HandyCandy.parquet"), Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc) in Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let Source = #"HandyCandyParquet",
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"TransactionId", "StoreId"}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns", "EndOfPreviousMonth", each Date.AddDays([TransactionDate], -Date.Day([TransactionDate]))),
  #"Added custom 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added custom", "Custom", each Date.AddDays([EndOfPreviousMonth], 1)),
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(#"Added custom 1", {{"Custom", "SalesMonth"}}),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Renamed columns", {"EndOfPreviousMonth", "TransactionDate"}),
  #"Reordered columns" = Table.ReorderColumns(#"Removed columns 1", {"SalesMonth", "Product", "Price"}),
  #"Added custom 2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Reordered columns", "ItemCount", each 1),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Added custom 2", {"SalesMonth", "Product"}, {{"SalesValueUSD", each List.Sum([Price]), type nullable number}, {"UnitsSold", each List.Sum([ItemCount]), type any}}),
  #"Changed column type" = Table.TransformColumnTypes(#"Grouped rows", {{"UnitsSold", Int64.Type}, {"SalesMonth", type date}}) in #"Changed column type";

dataflowSinks.name: UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad
dataflowSinks.script:
sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		RowId as integer,
		Retailer as string,
		SalesMonth as date,
		Product as string,
		ManufacturerProductCode as string,
		SalesValueUSD as decimal(18,2),
		UnitsSold as integer,
		SourceFileName as string,
		RunSeqNo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> UserQueryASQLdboSalesLoad
